description: This course provides a study of chemical stoichiometry and equilibrium at a level and pace appropriate to students with little or no background in chemistry. The combination of this course and the Interim course 123 provides coverage of topics equivalent to those in Chemistry 125. Students attend three classes and one 3-hour laboratory per week.
name: General Chemistry
notes: Students in Chemistry 121 must also register for one lab section AL, BL, or CL.
